means: 使用（ use的过去式和过去分词）

sentence.Network_en: Too bad he used his intelligence for criminal purposes.
sentence.Network_cn: 他把聪明都用在了犯罪上，太可惜了。

sentence.Network_en: Acupressure is used to release tension spots in the shoulders and neck.
sentence.Network_cn: 指压按摩用于缓解肩部和颈部的紧张。

sentence.Network_en: Eisenhower used his muscle to persuade Congress to change the law.
sentence.Network_cn: 艾森豪威尔用他的影响力说服国会修改了该项法律。

PerfectNetExp.abs: alfred binet believed his iq test should be used to ., 比奈智商测试 , 相信他应该用于.
高中英语新课程标准词汇表 ... use n.& vt.  利用，使用，应用 used a. 用过的；旧的；二手的 useful a. 有用的，有益的.
for one , have been used to working on a computer ., 比如我就已习惯在电脑上工作.
如何刊登二手 ( used ) 或已翻新 ( refurbished ) 的物品？ 如果是二手或已翻新的物品，请选择最精确的物品状况，并以刊登说明提供 …

list.abs: 高中英语新课程标准词汇表 ... used a. 用过的；旧的；二手的 useful a. 有用的，有益的 useless a. 无用的.
...，倒是十分恰当。因为它宣称珍道具并非完全“无用”(useless)，可是实际又没办法使，也就算不上“有用”(useful)，于是只好被称作“并非无用”了。
人教版小学英语三年级下册单词表 ... here youare 给你 use 使用 yo-yo 溜溜球.
允字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 使人信服;受人敬重〖 believe;respect〗 用,使用〖 use〗 确实,果真〖 indeed〗.
...优势国内一些域名投资者注册大量.us域名并不在于看中了us的国别意义,而是把它看成us(我们)的含义,他们认为这才是.us的对于大众的真正意义在有超过33,000家的美资企业以及100,000家.

entry.def: If something used to be done or used to be the case, it was done regularly in the past or was the case in the past.

example.ex: People used to come and visit him every day...
example.tran: 人们过去每天都来拜访他。

example.ex: He used to be one of the professors at the School of Education...
example.tran: 他曾是教育学院的一名教授。

entry.tran: 过去不曾（亦作did not use to 或 did not used to，尤用于口语）
entry.def: If something used not to be done or used not to be the case, it was not done in the past or was not the case in the past. The forms did not use to and did not used to are also found, especially in spoken English.

example.ex: Borrowing used not to be recommended...
At some point kids start doing things they didn't use to do. They get more independent...
example.tran: 从某个时候起，孩子们开始做以前不曾做的事情。他们变得更加独立。

entry.def: If you are used to something, you are familiar with it because you have done it or experienced it many times before.

example.ex: I'm used to having my sleep interrupted...
example.tran: 我习惯了睡觉时被吵醒。

example.ex: It doesn't frighten them. They're used to it.
example.tran: 这可吓不倒他们。他们已经习惯了。

entry.def: If you get used to something or someone, you become familiar with it or get to know them, so that you no longer feel that the thing or person is unusual or surprising.

example.ex: This is how we do things here. You'll soon get used to it...
example.tran: 我们这里就是这么做事的。你很快就会习惯的。

example.ex: He took some getting used to...
example.tran: 他过了一段时间才慢慢适应。

entry.tran: 用过的;不干净的；损坏的
entry.def: A used object is dirty or spoiled because it has been used, and usually needs to be thrown away or washed.

example.ex: ...a used cotton ball stained with makeup...
He took a used envelope bearing an Irish postmark.
example.tran: 他拿了一个盖着爱尔兰邮戳的旧信封。

entry.def: A used car has already had one or more owners.

example.ex: Would you buy a used car from this man?...
example.tran: 你会从这个人手里买一辆旧车吗？

example.ex: His only big purchase has been a used Ford.
example.tran: 他买的唯一一个大件就是一辆二手福特。

sentences.sentence: "the principle of surprise is the most used and misused of all the principles of war"- H.H.Arnold & I.C.Eaker
"after going out of his way to help his friend get the job he felt not appreciated but used"

means.word_mean: 3. previously used or owned by another;

auth_sentence.content: Repeat the process until the batter is used up.
auth_sentence.res_content: Repeat the process until the batter is used up.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Repeat the process until the batter is used up.

auth_sentence.content: I'd far sooner the word impairment was used.
auth_sentence.res_content: I'd far sooner the word impairment was used.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I'd far sooner the word impairment was used.

auth_sentence.content: They might have been used in a car advert.
auth_sentence.res_content: They might have been used in a car advert.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They might have been used in a car advert.

means.word_mean: 用过的, 旧的, 二手的

sentences.en: He doesn't want a used car.
There is a used glass on the coffee table.
sentences.cn: 桌子上有一个用过的杯子。

sentences.en: He is becoming used to listening to others.
sentences.cn: 他正变得习惯于听别人的意见。

jushi.english: There is a used glass on the coffee table.
jushi.chinese: 桌子上有一个用过的杯子。

jushi.english: He doesn't want a used car.
